languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.
languages.original_text: Отсек {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-орудий{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} одержим демоном. Когда лэнс-излучатель попадает в корпус вражеского судна, эта атака имеет 50% шанс начать {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Внутренний пожар{/g}. Однако если Внутренний пожар не начался, жестокий характер демона требует начать Внутренний пожар на флагмане вместо вражеского корабля.

traits.locale_text:
The Flagship's lance weapon bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the Flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's hull, it has a 50% chance to start internal fires on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the Flagship instead.

The Flagship's lance weapon bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the Flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's hull, it has a 50% chance to start internal fires on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the Flagship instead.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

languages.text: Отсек {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-орудий{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} одержим демоном. Когда лэнс-излучатель попадает в корпус вражеского судна, эта атака имеет 50% шанс начать {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Внутренний пожар{/g}. Однако если Внутренний пожар не начался, жестокий характер демона требует начать Внутренний пожар на флагмане вместо вражеского корабля.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffenbucht{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} ist von einem Dämon besessen.
Wenn die Lanze des Flaggschiffs den {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} eines feindlichen Schiffes trifft, besteht eine Chance von 50 %, auf diesem Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}interne Brände{/g} zu entfachen. Ist kein feindliches Schiff von internen Bränden betroffen, entfacht die gewalttätige Natur des Dämons Letztere auf dem Flaggschiff.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

languages.text:
La baie de {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} est possédée par un démon.
Chaque fois que la lance touche la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} d'un vaisseau ennemi, elle a 50 % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g} à bord. En revanche, si aucun vaisseau ennemi ne subit d'incendies internes, la nature violente du démon déclenche des incendies internes à bord du vaisseau amiral.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

traits.locale_text:
La baie de {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lances{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} est possédée par un démon.
Chaque fois que la lance du vaisseau amiral {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} d'un vaisseau ennemi, elle a 50 % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g} sur ce vaisseau. En revanche, si aucun vaisseau ennemi ne subit d'incendies internes, la nature violente du démon déclenche des incendies internes sur le vaisseau amiral.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}遭到了恶魔附体。
每当旗舰的光矛命中敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}时，都会有50%的几率在敌舰引发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}。然而，如果没有任何敌舰发生内部火灾，则恶魔会释放暴虐本性，在您的旗舰上引发内部火灾。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}遭到了恶魔附体。
每当旗舰的光矛{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}时，都会有50%的几率在敌舰引发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}。然而，如果没有任何敌舰发生内部火灾，则恶魔会释放暴虐本性，在您的旗舰上引发内部火灾。

languages.text:
La bahía de {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}arma de lanza{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} está poseída por un daemon.
Cuando la lanza de la nave insignia impacta en el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de una nave enemiga, tiene una probabilidad del 50 % de provocar un {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendio interno{/g} en la nave. Sin embargo, si ninguna nave enemiga sufre de incendios internos, la naturaleza violenta del daemon prende fuego al interior de la nave insignia.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

traits.locale_text:
La bahía de {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}arma de lanza{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} está poseída por un daemon.
Cuando la lanza de la nave insignia {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} en el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de una nave enemiga, tiene una probabilidad del 50 % de provocar un {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendio interno{/g} en la nave. Sin embargo, si ninguna nave enemiga sufre de incendios internos, la naturaleza violenta del daemon prende fuego al interior de la nave insignia.

languages.text:
この{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}ベイはディーモンに憑依されている。
旗艦のランスが敵艦の{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に命中した時、50%の確率でその艦に{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}を引き起こす。ただし、敵艦に船内火災が発生しない時、ディーモンの暴力的な本性が代わりにこの旗艦に船内火災を引き起こす。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} bay is possessed by a daemon.
Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.

traits.locale_text:
この{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}ベイはディーモンに憑依されている。
旗艦のランスが敵艦の{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に命中した時、50%の確率でその艦に{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}を引き起こす。ただし、敵艦に船内火災が発生しない時、ディーモンの暴力的な本性が代わりにこの旗艦に船内火災を引き起こす。

languages.text:
Bir iblis, {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}mızrak silahı{/g} bölmesini ele geçirildi.
Sancak gemisinin mızrağı, bir düşman gemisinin {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}gövdesini{/g} vurduğunda %50 olasılıkla o gemide {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangınlar{/g} çıkarır. Ancak hiçbir düşman gemisi iç yangına maruz kalmadığında iblisin vahşi tabiatı, bu kez sancak gemisinde iç yangınlara sebep olur.

Whenever the flagship's lance hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship. However, when no enemy ship is suffering from internal fires, the daemon's violent nature ignites internal fires on the flagship instead.
